description: Unique workflow instance identifier.
Position of event in the case (sorted by start time).
Business activity label; includes optional and rework steps.
Owning department for the activity.
Role of the acting resource.
Pseudonymous resource identifier (no PII).
Event start timestamp (UTC).
Event end timestamp (UTC).
Activity execution time in minutes.
Waiting time (queue/hand-offs) before this activity starts.
Estimated queue length at event start.
Proxy for global system load; higher means busier system.
Reference expected duration for this activity.
(duration - expected)/expected; >0 means slower than expected.
Label if event exhibits bottleneck properties (slow/queued/high load).
Case creation channel.
Geographic region.
Customer tier segment.
Customer industry (used to modulate vendor dependency & risk).
Company size bucket for the customer.
Operational/technical maturity of the customer organization.
Organizational risk tolerance.
Case priority (Low/Medium/High).
Service-level agreement allowance for case cycle time.
Whether the case cycle time exceeded the SLA (broadcast to all events).
Cumulative inter-department hand-offs observed in the case up to this event.
Final cycle time for the case (broadcast to all events).
Day of week of event start.
Hour of day of event start [0-23].
Calendar month of event start [1-12].
